ValidationRule.description: Quantity and Fee Inclusion should not be allowed to Edit if the Quote is Accepted by Customer or Accepted by SME or Rejected by SME or Cancelled or Completed
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( OR(ISPICKVAL( Service_Quote__r.HWS_Quote_Status__c,'Accepted by Customer'), ISPICKVAL( Service_Quote__r.HWS_Quote_Status__c,'Accepted by CDM') , ISPICKVAL( Service_Quote__r.HWS_Quote_Status__c,'Rejected by CDM') , ISPICKVAL( Service_Quote__r.HWS_Quote_Status__c,'Cancelled') , ISPICKVAL( Service_Quote__r.HWS_Quote_Status__c,'Completed'), ISPICKVAL( Service_Quote__r.HWS_Quote_Status__c,'OC Review')), OR(ISCHANGED(HWS_Quantity__c), ISCHANGED(HWS_Fee_Inclusion__c)))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Quantity and Fee Inclusion fields cannot be updated
